description:
./nova/virt/libvirt.xml.template hardcodes keymap en-us.
From a view point of internationalization, keymap should be configurable.

Attached patch resolves this issue.
title: vnc keymap should be configurable

comments.content:
VNC keymap is en-us statically.

We Japanese use ja keyboard in generally. So we can't operate vnc viewer.
This affect all of the people who does not use en-us keymap keyboard.

So, vnc keymap must be configurable for internationalizatiion.

Attached patch resolve this problem.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~toraneko

comments.content: The fix looks good.  Please propose it for merging.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
